about_the_game:
From the studio that gave you Small Press Tycoon comes Mezzanine – a psychotronic point-and-click adventure set deep within Multimedia Gulch on the eve of the year 2000.

Featuring

  • 400+ next-generation 3D prerenders utilizing raytrace technology at an immersive 800 by 600 pixels
  • Over 100MB of original audio and music tracks sampled at 44.1khz (Sound card required)
  • Realistic office-based gameplay
  • Non-linear exploration paths and multiple endings
  • Painstaking attention to period detail

All seamlessly montaged into an experience that is as interactive as it is cinematic. Think Myst with a corporate ladder!

Take on the role of the HR administrator for an up-and-coming bleeding edge media agency called Zentropy. It might be New Year’s Eve, but you’re busier than ever: staff reorganization, Y2K Q1 preparations, planning a corporate mindfulness retreat, and making sure the right year-end reports land on the right desks. This may require a pot of coffee!

Yet as the new millennium approaches, a strange vibe hangs in the air over San Francisco. Going about your duties, you may notice that things in this scrappy startup's office seem a little different lately and that its rebellious nature may in fact be guided by a hidden hand. Whether or not this is any of your business is your choice to make in Mezzanine! It's 1999 and a new world is waiting to be born.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 11.4 or greater
  • Processor: >2ghz AMD or Intel or M1 or Cyrix
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D acceleration
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Blaster or higher
  • Additional Notes: This game can run on a potato I'm sure you'll be fine
